subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Grete Waitz, the nine-time winner of the New York City Marathon, was remembered as a modest champion and a trailblazer for female runners at a tribute in Oslo.
snippet: Grete Waitz, the nine-time winner of the New York City Marathon, was remembered as a modest champion and a trailblazer for female runners at a tribute in Oslo.
